text: Charlotte Tillar Schexnayder (December 25, 1923 â€“ December 11, 2020) was an American journalist and politician. She was a member of the Arkansas House of Representatives from the 74th district from 1985 to 1999. She was born in Tillar, Arkansas. Schexnayder was a member of the Democratic Party. Schexnayder died on December 11, 2020 in Little Rock, Arkansas at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Arkansas Category:Journalists from Arkansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Charlotte Tillar Schexnayder
